examples: there were more than a thousand words of text
they handed out the printed text of the mayor's speech
he wants to reconstruct the original text

definitions.text: a passage from the Bible that is used as the subject of a sermon
examples: the preacher chose a text from Psalms to introduce his sermon

definitions.text: a book prepared for use in schools or colleges
examples: his economics textbook is in its tenth edition
the professor wrote the text that he assigned students to buy

definitions.text: the main body of a written work (as distinct from illustrations or footnotes etc.)
examples: pictures made the text easier to understand
